name: How To Make friends
description:
Making friends is a AI driven game where you create a mob of friends that go out and make more friends so that you can capture the flag form your opponent to earn points. Control them to take parts of the map and win the game.

Credits:

Benjamin McNeill

Mike Lee

/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

-----------BE WARNED YOU NEED 2 XBOX CONTROLS TO PLAY.---------------

-------------------------------AND A FRIEND----------------------------------

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

CONTROLS:

LEFT ANALOG STICK TO MOVE

A = SEND COMMAND

B = SCATTER

Y = FOLLOW

X = MELEE
